data.eml:eml: A review of Lista Walker, 1859 in China, with descriptions of five new species (Lepidoptera, Pyralidae, Epipaschiinae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Wang, Mingqiang, Chen, Fuqiang, Wu, Chunsheng (2017): A review of Lista Walker, 1859 in China, with descriptions of five new species (Lepidoptera, Pyralidae, Epipaschiinae). ZooKeys 642: 97-113, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.642.7157, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.642.7157
